overview: As a successful business executive and general manager with 25 years of experience across a combination of blue chip companies and start-ups, Jim Taschetta brings proven marketing and account management leadership to FreeMonee. Jim previously served as the CMO of Bare Escentuals, FRS Healthy Energy products and Yodlee.com. Additionally, he served in various executive positions leading brand management and marketing at The Procter & Gamble Co., The Coca- Cola Co. and Visa. Jim has extensive international experience having spent seven years living and working in Latin America while at P&G.
